## Block.setQBEPropertiesById() method

Apply Query By Example properties to field param class - narrow down on id

**Signature:**

```typescript
setQBEPropertiesById(props: FieldProperties, field: string, id: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  props | [FieldProperties](./forms42core.fieldproperties.md) | The QBE properties to apply. |
|  field | string | The name of the field to apply QBE properties to. |
|  id | string | The ID of the field to narrow down the search. |

**Returns:**

void
